about_the_game:
Refunds

As this product is not for everyone, please keep up-to-date on Steam's refund rules. Not included here as they can change, but keep that in mind. You can evaluate the full product and get a refund but within some time and usage limitations.

Before you buy...

Check out "VZX Player" - found in the box below - "More from Vovoid Media Technologies". For many users, that is an adequate option.

VZX Creative

The VZX music visualizer family of programs generates awesome audio reactive graphics in real time from any audio source - music player, youtube, microphone, line-in etc.

VZX Creative is an application suite for creatives and professionals who wish to have better control over live visualization playback and or create their own music visualizations.

VZX Creative is comprised of 2 separate products:

VZX Player Professional

  • Plays Vovoid's full range of Pro Player DLC visuals. (Does NOT play VZX Player DLC.)

  • Instead of using "game capture", supports SPOUT output for low-latency integration on the same computer with other software (OBS can support SPOUT input with a plugin).

  • Output separated from GUI:

    • The Output (VZX Pro Player) is a separate application/binary from the GUI (VZX Pro Controller).

    • Run GUI/Controller on one monitor, graphics output on another monitor.

    • Run GUI/Controller on one computer, output on another computer.

    • Control commands are sent over the network - locally or over the LAN.

  • Audio

    • Audio recording is also detached into its own application, can also run on a separate computer

    • Audio data is also sent via network - locally or over the LAN.

  • Preset creation with:

    • Support for tweak parameters (all DLC including consumer DLC packs)

    • Up to 4 layers of custom overlay images with full industry standard blend mode support (Only if you own Pro DLC)

  • Color Palette manager which can be used in tweak/overlay parameters in presets and chosen during live playback

  • Playlist support, multiple playlists

  • Handling of multiple complete states as mostly human-readable JSON files (where one state includes presets, palettes playlists etc)

  • In-app documentation

  • Plays custom-made visuals, made in VZX Artiste (included)

  • UI supports click actions on touch screens - for instance using an android tablet as an extra screen

  • Exactly position the output window for streaming setups

VZX Artiste

  • SPOUT with alpha support for designing custom GPU-accelerated stream overlays

  • Modular programming environment focused on letting you create your own music visuals and other content

  • Note: Opening/editing visuals in DLC packs is NOT supported

  • Immersive UI focused on fine-tuning the graphical output

  • Over 200 programming modules covering maths, rendering, audio input, image loading and more

  • In-app and online reference documentation
detailed_description:
Try the demo before buying!

This is the player for professional users. It's more complicated to set up and not intended for home / casual use. If casual use applies to you, please go check out VZX player instead. Link in description below.


what to expect from the Demo Version

Pro Player

  • Has a limited selection of visuals, and no loading of custom visuals. Otherwise feature complete.
  • Use this to evaluate if it fits your workflow / setup.

Artiste

  • Save feature is disabled - load examples and play with them or try creating your own
  • Full screen / full window display disabled


About the Software

Refunds

name: VZX Creative

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: x64/x86 CPU with 2 cores
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD OpenGL 4.6 discrete GPU. Intel HD Graphics is NOT supported.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: WASAPI-compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Intel GPUs (HD Graphics, Iris etc) are NOT supported!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: x64/x86 CPU with 4 cores
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD OpenGL 4.6 discrete GPU. Intel HD Graphics is NOT supported.
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: WASAPI-compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Intel GPUs (HD Graphics, Iris etc) are NOT supported!

short_description: Are you a Professional DJ? Pro Streamer? VJ? Installation Artist? Use VZX Pro Player to embellish your performances with real time music visuals. Create visualizations with VZX Artiste. Or are you just here to enjoy some visuals? Instead find "VZX Player" in "More from" at the bottom of this page.
